text: Najiyah bint al-Walid ibn al-Mughira () is a sahaba of Muhammad. She is the daughter of Walid ibn Mughira. Najiyah was one of women who became Muslim before their husbands did. Some of these women were prevented from doing the hijra while their husbands were still non-Muslims. ==See also== *Sahaba ==External links== * Muttaqun.com Category:Female Sahabah Category:Banu Makhzum Category:7th-century Arabs
